languages.text: {n}Абеляр склоняет голову в знак согласия. С его лица уходит призрак невероятного напряжения, которое владело им долгое время.{/n} "Я рад, что вы видите ценность в столпах, сотворенных вашей великой предшественницей. Зачем чинить то, что не сломано? Что касается меня — я сделаю все, чтобы больше не расстраивать вас, Лорд-капитан".

{n}Abelard dips his head in a sign of assent. The shadow of incredible strain, which evidently had been wearing on him for some time, finally lifts from his face.{/n} "I am glad you see the value in the foundations laid down by your illustrious predecessor. Why fix what isn't broken? As for me, I shall endeavour not to cause you any further consternation, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр склоняет голову в знак согласия. Зачем чинить то, что не сломано? Что касается меня — я сделаю все, чтобы больше не расстраивать вас, Лорд-капитан".

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德低下了头，表示赞同。一直以来，巨大的压力在他脸上留下的阴影，终于从他的脸上消散了。{/n}“您已经认识到，您杰出的前任行商浪人打下的基础有着重要的价值，这让我很高兴。既然没有损坏，那还有什么修复的必要呢？至于我，我会尽我所能，不再为您带来进一步的困扰，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard dips his head in a sign of assent. The shadow of incredible strain, which evidently had been wearing on him for some time, finally lifts from his face.{/n} "I am glad you see the value in the foundations laid down by your illustrious predecessor. Why fix what isn't broken? As for me, I shall endeavour not to cause you any further consternation, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德低下了头，表示赞同。一直以来，巨大的压力在他脸上留下的阴影，终于从他的脸上消散了。{/n}“您已经认识到，您杰出的前任行商浪人打下的基础有着重要的价值，这让我很高兴。既然没有损坏，那还有什么修复的必要呢？至于我，我会尽我所能，不再为您带来进一步的困扰，舰长大人。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard agacha la cabeza en señal de aceptación. La sombra de la carga gigantesca que llevaba tiempo consumiéndole por dentro por fin desaparece de su rostro.{/n} «Me alegro de que comprenda el valor de los cimientos que sentó su ilustre predecesora. ¿Por qué arreglar algo que no está roto? En cuanto a mí, me esforzaré por no causarle más consternaciones, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard dips his head in a sign of assent. The shadow of incredible strain, which evidently had been wearing on him for some time, finally lifts from his face.{/n} "I am glad you see the value in the foundations laid down by your illustrious predecessor. Why fix what isn't broken? As for me, I shall endeavour not to cause you any further consternation, Lord Captain."

La sombra de la carga gigantesca que llevaba tiempo consumiéndole por dentro por fin desaparece de su rostro.{/n} «Me alegro de que comprenda el valor de los cimientos que sentó su ilustre predecesora. ¿Por qué arreglar algo que no está roto? En cuanto a mí, me esforzaré por no causarle más consternaciones, Lord Capitán».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは頭を下げて同意の意を示す。しばらくの間、信じられないような緊張の影に包まれていたが、ようやくその表情から力が抜けた。{/n}「あなたの偉大な前任者が築いた基礎に価値を見いだされたことをうれしく思います。壊れていないものをなぜ直すのですか？我は、これ以上ご迷惑をおかけしないよう尽力いたしましょう、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard dips his head in a sign of assent. The shadow of incredible strain, which evidently had been wearing on him for some time, finally lifts from his face.{/n} "I am glad you see the value in the foundations laid down by your illustrious predecessor. Why fix what isn't broken? As for me, I shall endeavour not to cause you any further consternation, Lord Captain."

traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard neigt den Kopf als Zeichen seiner Zustimmung. Der Schatten der unglaublichen Anstrengung, die offenbar schon sehr lange an ihm gezehrt hatte, hebt sich endlich von seinem Gesicht.{/n} "Es freut mich, dass Ihr den Wert der Fundamente erkennt, die Eure illustre Vorgängerin gelegt hat. Warum etwas reparieren, was nicht kaputt ist? Was mich angeht, ich werde versuchen, Euch keinen Verdruss mehr zu machen, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard dips his head in a sign of assent. The shadow of incredible strain, which evidently had been wearing on him for some time, finally lifts from his face.{/n} "I am glad you see the value in the foundations laid down by your illustrious predecessor. Why fix what isn't broken? As for me, I shall endeavour not to cause you any further consternation, Lord Captain."

Warum etwas reparieren, was nicht kaputt ist? Was mich angeht, ich werde versuchen, Euch keinen Verdruss mehr zu machen, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard incline la tête en signe d'assentiment. L'ombre d'une tension accablante, qui de toute évidence lui pesait depuis quelque temps déjà, se dissipe tout à fait et son expression s'éclaircit.{/n} « Ravi de voir que vous appréciez à leur juste valeur les fondations jetées par votre illustre prédécesseure. À quoi bon réparer ce qui n'est pas brisé ? En ce qui me concerne, je ferai tout mon possible pour vous éviter de nouvelles déconvenues à l'avenir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard dips his head in a sign of assent. The shadow of incredible strain, which evidently had been wearing on him for some time, finally lifts from his face.{/n} "I am glad you see the value in the foundations laid down by your illustrious predecessor. Why fix what isn't broken? As for me, I shall endeavour not to cause you any further consternation, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard incline la tête en signe d'assentiment. L'ombre d'une tension accablante, qui de toute évidence lui pesait depuis quelque temps déjà, se dissipe tout à fait et son expression s'éclaircit.{/n} « Ravi de voir que vous appréciez à leur juste valeur les fondations jetées par votre illustre prédécesseure. À quoi bon réparer ce qui n'est pas brisé ? En ce qui me concerne, je ferai tout mon possible pour vous éviter de nouvelles déconvenues à l'avenir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, memnun bir hâlde başını eğiyor. Uzun zamandır üzerine çöktüğü her hâlinden belli olan yorgunluğun gölgesi, nihayet çehresini terk ediyor.{/n} "Yüce selefinizin geriye bıraktığı mirasa değer vermeniz beni mesut etti. Çalışıyorsa kurcalamamalı. Bense sizin başınıza daha çok iş açmamak için çabalayacağım Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard dips his head in a sign of assent. Why fix what isn't broken? As for me, I shall endeavour not to cause you any further consternation, Lord Captain."
